title: Is the $22k ARES x HPS Super Leggera the World’s lightest production e-road bike?
content:
Italian coachbuilder ARES already makes bespoke supercars and motorcycles. Can it also build the world’s lightest production e-road bike? That was the goal for ARES and HPS, as the companies put their collective heads together for two years of R&D to produce a carbon fiber e-road bike they say weighs just 9 kg — less

The post Is the $22k ARES x HPS Super Leggera the World’s lightest production e-road bike? appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Sam Anderson
